ns:common.document.text: The Bywater BASIC Interpreter (bwBASIC) is an interpreter for the BASIC programming language. It supports a large superset of the ANSI Standard for Minimal BASIC (X3.60-1978) and a large subset of the ANSI Standard for Full BASIC (X3.113-1987). Bywater BASIC is written in the C programming language, and runs on GNU and DOS based systems.\nBywater BASIC is open source and is freely available under the terms of the GNU General Public Licence.\nBywater basic provides the following features:
